purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the shape of a ply and its composite constituents which can be:

inscope.li: definition of the shape of a ply;
representation of the shape of composite constituents;
representation of the shape of composite constituents;
items within the scope of application module Advanced boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1514;
items within the scope of application module Construction geometry, ISO/TS 10303-1131;
items within the scope of application module Constructive solid geometry 3d, ISO/TS 10303-1068;
items within the scope of application module Curve swept solid, ISO/TS 10303-1659;
items within the scope of application module Edge based wireframe, ISO/TS 10303-1501;
items within the scope of application module Elementary boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1329;
items within the scope of application module Faceted boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1512;
items within the scope of application module Geometrically bounded surface, ISO/TS 10303-1507;
items within the scope of application module Geometrically bounded wireframe, ISO/TS 10303-1510;
items within the scope of application module Manifold surface, ISO/TS 10303-1509;
items within the scope of application module Shell based wireframe, ISO/TS 10303-1502;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/TS 10303-1753.

alt_map.description: Represent boundary as a parametric curve
alt_map.refpath: geometric_curve_set <= geometric_set geometric_set[i].elements -> geometric_set_select = curve curve => pcurve

alt_map.description: Represent boundary as a curve on a surface
alt_map.refpath: geometric_curve_set <= geometric_set geometric_set[i].elements -> geometric_set_select = curve curve => surface_curve

alt_map.description: Represent boundary as a curve on a surface
alt_map.refpath: geometric_curve_set <= geometric_set geometric_set[i].elements -> geometric_set_select = curve curve => bounded_curve => composite_curve => composite_curve_on_surface
